kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Appends the given content to the specified file.

kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.
